wikipedia_page.main: David Lees Caldwell (7 May 1932 – 2 August 2017) was a Scottish football player, who played for Aberdeen, Rotherham United and Greenock Morton. He won the Scottish Football League title in 1954–55 and the Scottish League Cup in 1955–56 with Aberdeen.

response: David or Dave Caldwell may refer to:
* 2 August 2017: Dave Caldwell, 85, Rotherham United left back.
*2 August: Dave Caldwell, 85, Aberdeen and Morton left back.
